original_title: How the Grinch Stole My Heart (and my favourite sweatshirt…)
overview: This short film borrows Dr. Seuss' famous villain, the Grinch, and transforms him from Whoville's mythical Christmas hating goblin into a modern-day ex-girlfriend who breaks Abigail's heart. Crushed by her loss, Abigail falls into a world of lovelorn misery, obsession, internet stalking and self-medicating. But finally, Abigail is struck by a sense of renewed self-worth, and triumphs over her love for the Grinch...or does she?
title: How the Grinch Stole My Heart (and my favourite sweatshirt…)
